price: 29. Waxaanse ugu raaxeeyey kuwaas (gaalada) iyo aabbayaashoodba (adduunka) ilaa uu u yimid Xaqu (Qur’aanka) iyo Rasuul cad9.
arabic: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡتُ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَرَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: 9. Waxaa loola jeedaa Nabi Muxammad s.c.w.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: bal mattaʿtu hāulāi waābāahum ḥattā jāahumu al-ḥaqu warasūlun mubīnun
